pageContent: Purpose: Androgen deprivation therapy is a common treatment in men with prostate cancer that may cause fatigue, functional decline, increased body fatness, and loss of lean body tissue. These physical changes can negatively affect health-related quality of life. Resistance exercise may help to counter some of these side effects by reducing fatigue, elevating mood, building muscle mass, and reducing body fat.

metaData.source:
Combination of proteasomal inhibitors lactacystin and MG132 induced synergistic apoptosis in prostate cancer cells
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16354593/
